nodes.text: The R-Duba system was a star system located in the Quiberon sector of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories that contained the planet R-Duba.

The R-Duba system first appeared in Droids 5, the fifth issue of the Star Wars Legends Star Wars: Droids comic series published by Star Comics, an imprint of Marvel Comics, which was first published on December 1, 1986. It was first identified in The Essential Atlas, a reference book written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace and released on August 18, 2009, which placed the system in grid square T-15.
